stepAnswer: information included in a medical record that can be used to identify an individual and that was used, created, or disclosed in the process of providing a $$health-care$$ service
stepTitle: What is covered by HIPAA (protected health information (PHI))?
choices: information included in a medical record that can be used to identify an individual and that was used, created, or disclosed in the process of providing a $$health-care$$ service
information related to the nurse and their care procedures
